about.title: Our Story
about.subtitle: Where Elegance Meets Authenticity
about.description: Founded in 2020, The Boutique at Horton Place represents the perfect blend of simple luxury and curated global lifestyle. We believe in creating personalized experiences that celebrate individual style while maintaining the highest standards of craftsmanship and quality.
about.philosophy: Our philosophy centers around simple luxury - the belief that true elegance lies in thoughtful curation, exceptional quality, and personalized service.
about.mission: To provide an exclusive boutique experience that transforms fashion into personal storytelling.
